name: Heroes of Martinburg
description:
This game was developed to improve my skills in C++ coding.

Some characters may be alike characters from other stories.

I don't own any rights of ending song - Thousand foot krutch - the end is where we begin

While playing read carefully every line.

I was in struggle while creating the story.

In mosquito nest in forest you can gain almost free XPs.

If you speak with wizard after completing his quest you will be able to learn spells. Don't forget them.

Try to think and don't rage.

Special thanks:

-Norika

-Classmates

-Rodovoj band
